thread.title: A.L. Brown holds off Robinson comeback to stay perfect

title: A.L. Brown holds off Robinson comeback to stay perfect

WCNC.com: http://www.wcnc.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/10/al-brown-holds-off-robinson-comeback-to-stay-perfect/73726422/   Join the Conversation To   A.L. Brown holds off Robinson comeback to stay perfect A.L. Brown held off Jay M. Robinson 28-21 to stay unbeaten in 2015. WCNC WCNC 11:37 a.m. EDT October 10, 2015 CONNECT 4 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
KANNAPOLIS, N.C. -- The A.L. Brown Wonders appeared to be poised to another runaway victory Friday, scoring two quick touchdowns against Jay M. Robinson. 
The Bulldogs, now competing in the 3A South Piedmont Conference, overcame a slow start, however, but fell just short in a comeback bid, with Brown holding on for a 28-21 victory. 
The Wonders have been nothing short of impressive this season en route to their 7-0 record, including victories over Concord, Mooresville, and Vance. They'll get another test next week as they host Hough in a battle for first place in the Mecka.
